definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Vujacic said he wasn't sure when he suffered the avulsion fracture.
sentences.chinese: 武贾西奇说，他并不知道什么时候骨头撕脱了。

sentences.english: Adem, how much has it helped having fellow countrymen Nemanja Vidic and Zoran at the club?
sentences.chinese: 亚当，同胞维迪奇和托西奇对你有帮助吗？

sentences.english: Winger Zoran Tosic has joined FC Cologne on loan until the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 边锋托西奇以租借的形式加盟科隆，直到赛季结束。

sentences.english: Sasha faces animosity from all sides.
sentences.chinese: 而武贾西奇面临着主客双方的敌意。

sentences.english: Bayern Munich have joined the race for highly coveted Serbia winger Milos Krasic.
sentences.chinese: 拜仁慕尼黑已经加入对塞维利亚边翼克拉西奇的争夺。

sentences.english: The honest truth is that there may not be a player more relatable to the common man than Sasha Vujacic.
sentences.chinese: 事实是，可能没有人比武贾西奇更平凡普通。

sentences.english: The Lakers have been experimenting with using Sasha Vujacic at point guard on occasion in the preseason.
sentences.chinese: 湖人在季前赛曾尝试过让武贾西奇当控卫。

sentences.english: Milos Krasic? We know Juventus have strong points, but so do we.
sentences.chinese: 克拉西奇？尤文图斯是有强手，但是我们也一样。

sentences.english: "It wasn't just the strikers who were let loose, it was also the midfielders, " said Tosic.
sentences.chinese: “不只是前锋有责任进球，中场也一样，”托西奇说。

sentences.english: Vujacic's injury officially is diagnosed as an avulsion fracture of his left ankle, the team said.
sentences.chinese: 湖人队后卫武贾西奇正式被确诊为左脚踝撕脱骨折。

definition: Pope Vigilius (in office 537-555)/phonetic -vich or -wich in Russian names
